p: CLART ® PneumoVir array system (Genomica, Coslada, Madrid, Spain) was used to identify genomic sequences of human respiratory viruses, according to the manufacturer’s recommendations. Influenza viruses (A, B, and C), human parainfluenza viruses 1-4 (subtypes A and B), respiratory syncytial virus (types A and B), human rhinovirus, metapneumovirus (subtypes A and B), echovirus, adenovirus, human coronavirus 229E, and bocavirus have been investigated by this technique.
